name: animation-text-reveal
description: Character and word staggered text reveal animation with multiple presets — fade, blur, scale, and rotate effects
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { TextReveal, TextRevealGroup } from './components/animation-text-reveal/TextReveal';

<TextReveal text="Hello World" preset="fade-up" />
<TextReveal text="Character by character" splitBy="char" preset="blur" />
<TextReveal text="From the left" preset="fade-left" stagger={0.03} />

// Sequential group — each line animates after the previous
<TextRevealGroup>
  <TextReveal text="First line appears" />
  <TextReveal text="Then this one" />
  <TextReveal text="And finally this" />
</TextRevealGroup>
